verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H5927>him<s%>, When thou lightest the <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> shall give <S%H215>light<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H5927>so<s%>; he lighted the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof so as to give light in <S%H4136>front<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And this was the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, <S%H4749>beaten<s%> work of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; unto the <S%H3409>base<s%> <S%H6525>thereof<s%>, and unto the flowers <S%H4749>thereof<s%>, it was beaten work: according unto the <S%H4758>pattern<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Take <S%H3947><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and cleanse <S%H2891>them<s%>.

And thus shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H2891>them<s%>, to cleanse <S%H5137>them<s%>: sprinkle the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H2403>expiation<s%> upon <S%H8593>them<s%>, and let them cause a razor to pass over all their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and cleanse <S%H2891>themselves<s%>.

Then let them <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and its <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>; and <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H6950>assemble<s%> the <S%H6950>whole<s%> <S%H4150>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>:

and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5130>offer<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%>, on the behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that it may be theirs to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>: and <S%H6213>offer<s%> thou the <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>, unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5130>offer<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Thus shalt thou <S%H914>separate<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the Levites shall be <S%H3881>mine<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> that shall the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> to do the <S%H5647>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H5130>them<s%>, and offer them for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%>.

For they are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> unto me from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; instead of all that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%>, even the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, have I taken them unto <S%H3947>me<s%>.

For all the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H120>mine<s%>, both man and <S%H929>beast<s%>: on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I sanctified them for <S%H6942>myself<s%>.
And I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead of all the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> as a <S%H5414>gift<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; that there be no <S%H5063>plague<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> unto the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.

Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: according unto all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> touching the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel unto <S%H3478>them<s%>.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H2398>purified<s%> themselves from <S%H3526>sin<s%>, and they washed their <S%H899>clothes<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5130>offered<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> made <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them to cleanse <S%H2891>them<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in to <S%H5647>do<s%> their <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> concerning the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, so did they unto <S%H6213>them<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

This is that which belongeth unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6633>wait<s%> upon the <S%H5656>service<s%> in the work of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>:
and from the <S%H1121>age<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they shall <S%H7725>cease<s%> <S%H6635>waiting<s%> upon the <S%H5656>work<s%>, and shall serve no <S%H5647>more<s%>,

but shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and shall <S%H5647>do<s%> no <S%H5656>service<s%>. Thus shalt thou <S%H5647>do<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> touching their <S%H4931>charges<s%>.
